definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent

sentences.english: His life was devoted to introducing and disseminating logical empiricism and scientific spirit.
sentences.chinese: 他的一生熱忱地介紹傳播邏輯經驗論思想和科學精神。
他是個熱忱的愛國志士。

sentences.english: The banquet was held in an atmosphere of friendship and cordiality.
sentences.chinese: 宴會在熱忱友好的氣氛中進行。

sentences.english: However, overdependence on tradition will result in rigidness and loss of enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 但過於依賴傳統會導致教會僵化，失去熱忱。

sentences.english: To give your enthusiasm a push in the right direction, refer to your notebook when the spiral is collapsing in on itself.
sentences.chinese: 當熱忱的螺旋轉錯方向時，不妨回顧一下你的記事簿。

sentences.english: Company to the spirit of hard work, and actively explore enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 公司以艱苦創業的精神，積極開拓的熱忱。

sentences.english: Members of the new and old customers to patronize, I will warmly for your service.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎各新老用戶的光顧，我公司將熱忱爲你服務。

sentences.english: We would like to offer good quality products and good service to the old and new customers warmheartedly .
sentences.chinese: 我廠願熱忱爲新老客戶提供優質的產品和良好的服務。

sentences.english: We should be warm towards our comrades, not ice cold and indifferent.
sentences.chinese: 看待同志要滿腔熱忱，不能冷冷清清，漠不關心。

sentences.english: Some of the most energetic people in the life-extension movement are intensely religious .
sentences.chinese: 在生命擴展運動中最積極的人們是熱忱信奉宗教的人。

sentences.english: They limit the spirit and enthusiasm of children.
sentences.chinese: 他們扼殺了孩子的精神和熱忱。

sentences.english: Funds were found and, armed with a wealth of enthusiasm, mother and daughter started out.
sentences.chinese: 資金終於湊足，懷着滿腔熱忱，母女倆出發了。

sentences.english: Years may wrinkle the skin, but to give up to enthusiasm wrinkles the soul.
sentences.chinese: 歲月悠悠，衰微之及肌膚，熱忱拋卻，頹廢必致靈魂。

sentences.english: Warmly welcome new and old customers all over the call co-operation Regards.
sentences.chinese: 熱忱歡迎新老客戶來人來電商祺合作。

sentences.english: Welcome domestic and international enterprise and friend to patronize cooperation heartily.
sentences.chinese: 熱忱歡迎國內外企業和朋友惠顧合作。

definition: care/solicitude/to show care for/concerned about/attentive to
to praise/to approve of/to show approval
to spare no pains or effort (idiom); to do one's utmost
to offer respectfully/to consecrate/to dedicate/to devote
willing (to do sth)/to take pleasure in
to show concern and care for
to develop/to make full use of
